			//apple_ref/occ/instm/PLVReceiptGenerator/generateReceiptWithWidth:fontSize:lineSpacing:padding:completionHandler:
			Generates the receipt image.
			PLVReceiptGenerator.h
			
			- (void)generateReceiptWithWidth:(CGFloat)width fontSize:(CGFloat)fontSize lineSpacing:(CGFloat)lineSpacing padding:(CGFloat)padding completionHandler:(void ( ^ ) ( CGImageRef receipt ))completionHandler
			
				
					width
					Receipt image width.
				
					fontSize
					Receipt font size.
				
					lineSpacing
					Receipt text line spacing.
				
					padding
					Receipt contents padding.
				
					completionHandler
					Block that is called when the receipt generation finishes. The block takes a single
parameter receipt.

			//apple_ref/occ/instm/PLVPaymentTask/cancel
			Cancels the payment task. Calling this method doesn't cancel the task immediately.
